query:
UPDATE libraries
            SET
                name = $1,
                library_type = $2,
                paths = $3,
                scan_interval_minutes = $4,
                enabled = $5,
                auto_scan = $6,
                watch_for_changes = $7,
                analyze_on_scan = $8,
                max_retry_attempts = $9,
                movie_ref_batch_size = $10,
                updated_at = NOW()
            WHERE id = $11
